title: Los Angeles County MEHKO
description: LA County MEHKO (excludes Pasadena, Long Beach, Vernon). Up to 30 meals/day, 90/week, $100k cap.

steps.title: Plan Your MEHKO
steps.content:
- [How to Get Started (PDF)](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_HowToGetStarted-English.pdf)
- [Self-Inspection Checklist (PDF)](http://ph.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_Self-InspectionChecklist-English.pdf)
- Ensure kitchen & menu align with MEHKO rules

steps.title: Approvals & Training
steps.content:
- Landlord approval (if renting)
- Get Certified Food Protection Manager (CFPM)
- Check city business license
- Register for sales tax
- Check ABC if serving alcohol

steps.title: Prepare Required Documents
steps.content:
- [SOP template (PDF)](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_SOP-English.pdf) + your menu
- [Public Health Permit Application (PDF)](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_PublicHealthPermitApplication-ENG.pdf)
- CFPM certificate
- Food Handler Cards (if employees)
- Water test (if private well)

steps.title: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
steps.content: Fill out and submit the SOP form. Source: [SOP template (PDF)](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_SOP-English.pdf)

steps.title: Health Permit Application
steps.content: Complete and submit the official [Public Health Permit Application (PDF)](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_PublicHealthPermitApplication-ENG.pdf).

steps.title: Submit Application & Fees
steps.content:
- Submit the [application PDF](http://publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/business/MEHKO_PublicHealthPermitApplication-ENG.pdf)
- Pay $597 review fee (unless subsidized)

steps.title: Schedule & Pass Inspection
steps.content:
- Department schedules inspection
- Fix issues and complete follow-ups if needed

steps.title: Receive Permit
steps.content: Permit will be mailed upon approval.

steps.title: Operate & Stay Compliant
steps.content:
- Follow approved SOP
- Notify program of changes within 20 days
- Stay within $100k/year, 30/day, 90/week limits
- See: [Guide to Food Safety in a Home Kitchen (PDF)](http://www.publichealth.lacounty.gov/eh/docs/safety/guide-food-safety-your-home-kitchen-en.pdf)

steps.title: Limited-Time Subsidy
steps.content: Fee waiver available for first 1,000 applicants (net revenue < $50k, no prior subsidy). Deadline: June 30, 2026 or until funds run out.
